ygData.subject: Group Bard Primer
ygData.msgSnippet: I am not going to be in a regular group for a while, so I thought I would make a little Bard Primer for when I join pick-up groups. Despite my flailings
ygData.messageBody:
I am not going to be in a regular group for a while, so I thought I would
make a little "Bard Primer" for when I join pick-up groups.
Despite my flailings about here lately *smile* once in a group and having
picked my songs I am seriously on task and (BION) focused. So here is the
first pass, some of these may be more strongly worded than the reality, but
they need to be brief and communicate teh concept. The hardest part is that
they have to all fit in a Social or three. I would love to hear
suggestions(remember it has to fit in a single line (at most two) of a
social which is somewhere around 48 characters:

I am extremely focused on the collective survival
that being said there are some realities:
Heal+DoT=MegaTaunt.I only sing heal in combat
if few mobs/great taunter or I can save a life
Outdoors I am your fastest/safest ticket to zone

I am a mob magnet, I need the healers attention
If healer burns I will spend half my time zoning
Announce root/mezz of mob,songs can break them
Selo's does not break SoW, jig does not speed med
I get the mana song in 6 levels :o)

So I am not remembering how many slots a social has, but the last two are
optional. Any suggestions? I mostly hunted with a small, good group, so
there may be some things I have never had to address specifically.

TIA v.2,
Tszaaz E'Taurguin
